title: How to Survive When the Bottom Drops Out
description: How to Survive When the Bottom Drops Out is a guide to help you through the rough patches in the road of life. Not just another "how to" book, this work describes some of the more trying times in the authorâ€™s life in a touching and humorous way.Despite a seemingly endless series of obstacles, J.T. has managed to come out with his optimism and love of life still intact. This book shares the author's philosophy that life is much easier to handle if you can see it from the right perspective. If a different and refreshing take on life is what you need, this book is just what the doctor ordered.
author: J.T. Sather
